title: Funky Hotel in the Heart of the Theatre District
text:
An awesome hotel for the business traveller or couples. Set in the heart of the theatre district the rooms a cleverly designed to make good use of limited space. The beds are generous and the shower spacious.
Free access to wifi and movies with a mezzanine and lounge area for when you need to work but want a change of scene from your room. There are even several computers available on the mezzanine for use by guests.
Sporting an onsite gym and guests only roof top bar you could chose to never leave the hotel but the bright lights of New York will lure you out.
In house dining, a Duanereade on the corner and dozens of cafes and restaurants right outside the door means you are spoilt for eating choice.
The staff are friendly and helpful without being intrusive and the hotel vibe is light hearted with cheeky Quote: s at every turn and tongue in cheek digs at the offerings of standard hotels.
In the words of Nike - Just Do It - you won't regret it.
